attributes.action: Stop allowing immigrants into the UK. Close all borders to protect UK citizens.
attributes.background: Keep the UK safe! Stop allowing immigrants to come in to the UK to live and claim our benefits. Stop all benefits to non UK citizens and only allow people from other countries to come live in the UK if they have a job lined up and no criminal records.

rejection.details:
We are unsure whether you are asking for the Government to stop all immigration to the UK, or to only allow immigrants who have jobs lined up and no criminal records. 
If you would like to redraft and resubmit your petition it will be reconsidered. Please also note that you will need to include your full name for us to be able to accept your petition.
